core

Interface Problem


  • public interface Problem
    Enables solving new problems by implementing the successors and merge functions. The interface State should also be implemented.
    Author:
    Vianney Copp√©

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node merge(Node[] nodes)
      Given a set of nodes, returns a new node with a State and a value leading to a relaxed MDD.
      int nVariables()
      Returns the number of variables of the problem.
      Node root()
      Returns the initial node of the problem i. e. the empty assignment.
      List<Node> successors(Node node, Variable var)
      Given a node and a variable, returns the list of nodes reached after having assigned the variable to every possible value.

    • Method Detail

      • root

        Node root()
        Returns the initial node of the problem i. e. the empty assignment.
        Returns:
        an object Node representing the root.

      • nVariables

        int nVariables()
        Returns the number of variables of the problem.
        Returns:
        an integer equal to the number of variables

      • successors

        List<Node> successors(Node node,
                      Variable var)
        Given a node and a variable, returns the list of nodes reached after having assigned the variable to every possible value. Should transmit the cost, the exact property, the variables and assign a valid State to the successors.
        Parameters:
        node - a node
        var - a variable belonging to the node's variables and not assigned yet
        Returns:
        an array of nodes resulting from a valid value assigned to the variable based on the given node

      • merge

        Node merge(Node[] nodes)
        Given a set of nodes, returns a new node with a State and a value leading to a relaxed MDD.
        Parameters:
        nodes - a set of nodes
        Returns:
        the resulting merged node, should have consistent variables and indexes arrays
